description: To test whether That increases from 0 to 100 as This increases from 0 to 100.
To test whether That2 increases at a faster rate than This because of the positive self feedback loop on That2.
To test whether That3 increases at a slower rate than This because of the negative self feedback loop on That2.
To test whether That increases from 0 to 100 as This2 decreases from 100 to 0.
To test whether That2 increases at a faster rate than This2 decreases because of the positive self feedback loop.
To test whether That3 grows at a slower rate than This2 decreases because of the negative self feedback loop on it.
